张量网络(Tensor Network)
=====================================================

学习张量网络相关基础知识的笔记。

开坑计划：

MPS与MPO的基础 -> DMRG -> Ab-initio DMRG

PEPS基础 -> Fermionic PEPS

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Content
   :numbered:
   
   Matrix Product States (MPS) <mps>
   Projected Entangled-Pair States (PEPS) <peps>
